title: Full-Sized Washer/Dryer, Assigned Covered Parking
posting_body: GLORIA PARK VILLAS APARTMENTS IN LAS VEGAS
We offer 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in a small gated community.
We have garages and storage lockers for rent and we are pet friendly.
We have 2 swimming pools, spa, fitness center and gas barbecues throughout the community.
All apartments come with washer, dryer, refrigerator/freezer, oven/stove, microwave, ceiling fan, central heating/AC, everything is electric.
Resident will be responsible for all utilities in addition to the rent.
We charge for water, trash, sewer, real estate tax and CAM Fee and bill monthly through UB West.
We do require renter's insurance with $100,000.00 liability coverage.
Want more info on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.
Cats & Dogs only, maximum 2 pets per apartment.
Breed restrictions apply, non-aggressive breeds only.
$300.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $35.00 monthly pet rent for 1 pet.
$400.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $50.00 monthly pet rent 2 pets.
3 times the amount of rent, total household gross income.
We are located between Spring Mountain Road and Twain Ave., on S. Decatur Blvd.
3625 S. Decatur Blvd., Las Vegas, NV, 89103
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
